name: Charge Roll
description:
Charge Roll

You play as Bop (Ball of Power) who was captured and in prisoned by the Danagers. You have managed to escape your cage but now have to reach the exit to be free. However, you require power to keep on rolling so make sure you get to those Power Points in order to recharge. Be careful though, the Danagers have set up different kind of traps which may make it difficult to escape. The last section may be hard but it is doable.

Controls

  • A  / Left arrow key to move left
  • D / Right arrow key to move right
  • Space to jump
  • Escape to pause

Made for Ludum Dare 39 which had the theme "Running out of power".
